abstract: Op-Ed article by Jared Bernstein, former economic adviser to Vice President Joseph R Biden, contends the idea of small business plays exaggerated role in American political dialogue; notes there is no demonstrable connection between size of business and its ability to create jobs.
snippet: To the extent that size matters at all for job growth, it’s really about new companies that will start small and, if they survive, perhaps grow large.
lead_paragraph: To the extent that size matters at all for job growth, it’s really about new companies that will start small and, if they survive, perhaps grow large.

headline.seo: Small Businesses Aren’t Key to the Economic Recovery
